page.title: 20CHALFONTS AREA SUMMARY
page.content: 3 schools in our area have participated in the D.P.. The schools being Jordans School,Lovel End County First School and Chalfont St. Peter C.E. Middle. After an initial meeting,interviews were arranged with local people and all three schools would like to thank anyone who has given freely of their time, in helping us with the quick and thorough completion of the project. Particular thanks go to the three teachers involved, Miss Davies, Mrs Smith and Miss Stockwell and a special mention should be made to Mr. W. Brown of C.S.P. Middle School,who has had the unenviable job of co-ordinating the computing side of the project. Thanks must also go to a small group of boys in his class who have been an enormous asset whilst information has been typed onto the disc.
